item.title: Reminders For This Week
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:546813”]-Downloads bejeweled-
It’s candy crush before candy crush was even an idea.

That and I played this shit all the time with my free trials when I first got my computer (I hope someone remembers that shit…)[/quote]
I do, way back in the day when all I played was game demos because my parents wouldn’t buy me the full versions lol.

item.title: Reminders For This Week
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Excellent list, I can say that Prison Architect has come a long long way since it was first released. Originally I had a lot of frustrations with the power system, etc. but from what my brother has told me they have really kept up with the updates.
